website_summaries.verdict: An economical tablet floor stand that boasts a height-adjustable gooseneck and other unparalleled features.
pros: Length of the stand's telescoping pole can easily be adjusted by pressing the clip in the middle of the pole
Includes a roller holder that allows you to hang toilet paper rolls, bags or other objects
Steel body and heavy base ensure your tablet is fully supported at all times
cons: Gooseneck is too short to use the stand with a bed
Can be difficult to stretch the stand's clamp to insert or take out a tablet

customer_reviews.title: Too short!  Needs to be prepped on a table
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble. I thought I was missing an extra rod but found out I wasn't. I purchased this for use when on a treadmill. You will notice they have a stock photo of someone using it that way but you do not see the base. That's because you will need to set it on a table. Deceiving in my opinion. This item would be prefect if you are going to use it while seating on a toilet, most likely it is the perfect height. This would explain the toilet roll holder. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Vermilus

customer_reviews.title: Really good stand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could use my Kindle or iPad without having to constantly bend my neck. It really does help. The “gooseneck” could be a bit longer but it still works the way I want it to. I had a holder that clips to the arm of the chair but it was annoying to have to remove it and replace it every time I got up. This is much easier to use. It does wobble a little when playing solitaire or sudoku but it’s so much better then having neck pain from constantly bending my neck. I left off the TP holder.
customer_reviews.author: Dickens

customer_reviews.title: great idea
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice. Build quality is good. The base weight is pretty hefty. The tablet clamp is very strong. The toilet paper roll holder is comical. Overall I'm pleased with this product. It's a little shorter than I would have liked, and the gooseneck could be a little longer. I use this to hold a tablet in front of my bike trainer in my pain cave. I hoped I could hang a towel on the tp roll, but it's too low to reach in front of the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Greg C

customer_reviews.title: ) When I am sitting in my chair it is perfect, especially when I am playing a game with ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a teenie bit shaky when you are touching while playing a game etc., but it still clearly beats holding it for a long time (or short time for that matter!) When I am sitting in my chair it is perfect, especially when I am playing a game with my grandson! I highly recommend it, although I do not put toilet paper on it, but it is a great place to hang a rag to wipe off sticky fingers who want to use Grandma's ipad! The spring to hold the pad in place is a mite difficult to get the tablet in, but then again, it does not slip once in place no matter which way your turn it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item. It's quite stable, has good height adjustments. Seems well constructed. It wobbles a bit with a 10.5 inch ipad but the ipad does fit, including with a slim case on it! The lowest setting is still a bit too "high" for me but it'll work I think, probably better for watching movies than playing games unless you brace it a little while in use. Word to the wise, this item ships in its own box, with pictures plainly displayed. So if you live in an apartment complex you might want to meet the postal worker rather than letting them drop it off, unless you want everyone to know you just bought a tablet stand for your bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: emonk

customer_reviews.title: Dad loved it and used it constantly
customer_reviews.text: Not a quality product. Bought it for Father’s Day. Dad loved it and used it constantly. Except, one week later the PLASTIC clip that holds the device to the ball bearing cracked and broke. It is now useless as a device stand. Dad is quite resourceful, however, and since the base is actually pretty sturdy, he uses it as a coat hook. I give it one star for this reason only.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Drummers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand in order to use an iPad for drum practice. I couldn’t have designed a tool more perfect for that need. It stays out of my way while drumming but also allows easy access to the tablet interface when needed. Plus the toilet paper roll hook makes a handy headphone holder! This thing is built sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it should cost waaaay more.
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this thing is great! It holds my 10.5” tablet securely. The base is plenty heavy for stability. It took me about 6 minutes to put it together. (I left off the TP holder since I’m using it in the living room, but I can always add it later.) And the price can’t be beat! This has got to be the best deal on amazon, lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were taller.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was taller. I can’t jog on a treadmill I have to use an elliptical. I bought this so that it can be near me so that I can control my virtual jogs and my workouts can be seen on a larger screen. It’s a good product when sitting down, not for what I needed it for. Do you make a longer gooseneck to fit this stand? Three stars are just for the height. TR
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: My tablet has fallen to the floor using some other stand, it won't happen with this stand.
customer_reviews.text: I love the stand, it's sturdy and the tablet clamp though hard to open is very secure. That said, I gave it four stars because the gooseneck is not long enough for when I use the tablet in bed. I have to be close to the edge of the bed. Make the gooseneck double the size and you have an absolute winner. As far as using the stand while sitting on the couch, it's perfect. I blow my nose a lot and I run out of tissue and I end up using toilet paper a lot and the holder is inspired.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix12

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold my iPad while playing guitar and for FaceTiming. Also works fine to hold my iPhone 11. The clamps are secure but not too stiff. The base is pretty stable. I could wish for a little more height for certain situations but it’s not a huge deal. I have no idea why there’s a toilet paper holder but I amuse myself by making people guess what it is. Most think it’s a footrest 😆
customer_reviews.author: A. Wooley

customer_reviews.title: Good but can use some improvements
customer_reviews.text: It's nice sturdy stand. I like it overall. Two areas can improve. The holding piece cannot extend enough to accommodate iPad cover. I must take iPad out of cover in order to fit. Another thing, why toilet paper holder? Whose bathroom doesn't already have a toilet paper holder? Or at least make the holder foldable. It would be better if it's slightly taller.
customer_reviews.author: PAUSER

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, sturdy, adjustable tablet stand
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought a CTA Digital brand stand whose rolling base broke before within four months of use. This model doesn’t have wheels but it is solid, dependable, easy to assemble and affordable. The height is adjustable. The gooseneck and the swiveling tablet holder make it easy find an optimal viewing angle. All in all,.I’m very happy with my purchase and just wish I had bought this the first time I went looking for an iPad stand.
customer_reviews.author: FlaZeta

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great expensive cat toy when broken after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great expensive cat toy when broken after 4 month🐈💩 Previously Rated ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ I should have bought one of these years ago I could be spending so much more time online. Actually it's great I don't have to hold on to that tablet all the time it's fit my Galaxy Tab. Very good for multitasking. When you have to be on the phone and on the computer at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Artfo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to hold an iPad next to my bicycle trainer. It was trivial to assemble, and seems quite sturdy. The toilet paper roll holder is not useful in this application (it's too low to hold a towel); luckily it's optional. My only nit is that it is a few inches short for what I want, but I can still use it, and it was my bad for not checking the exact height before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: A Careful Reader

customer_reviews.title: Best value ever. It is a great tablet stand
customer_reviews.text: Best value ever. It is a great tablet stand. Strong goose neck and heavy base for such a small price. Mine is holding a fire tablet with Alexa right next to the hot tub so we can watch videos and talk with Alexa if we want. Plan on getting another one for pool side this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Edited Visions

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This stand was extremely easy and quick to install and serves its purpose, but the gooseneck could be at least twice as long. I would like to place the stand to the side and bring the screen to the center. The way it is now, you either have to place the stand in the center or keep your face turned in one direction. If they ever make one with a longer gooseneck, I will definitely buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Use a permanent picture frame in the tension area. Then rubber band your iPad to that picture frame
customer_reviews.text: Concept is great. We use it all the time, however we have stuck a 5 by 7 piecture frame into the grip area because taking the standard size iPad was so difficult, I was afraid of damaging the iPad. I use two rubberbands and hook the iPad to the permanently placed 5 by 7 iPad, works fine this way.
customer_reviews.author: JewelryProfessional

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected! Nothing flimsy here!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. I was pleasantly surprised by the weight and quality of this stand. It is heavy and very durable. The directions for assembling it were so clear and I know I assembled it in under a minute. It holds my 10-inch tablet very securely and the adjustable height and viewing angles are excellent. I absolutely love it, so glad I bought it, worthy of the price, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Pretty slick! A must for distance learners! Perfect for virtual piano lessons.
customer_reviews.text: This has set my son up perfectly for virtual piano lessons! I was almost detoured by the review commenting about height. Glad I didn’t give it too much weight. I hung headphones from the TP roll bar. It will be just as if his piano teacher is sitting next to him now. The shipping speed was a pleasant surprise too. Thank you for making distance learning that much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca O

customer_reviews.title: Not secure enough
customer_reviews.text: I hope for a good product. The entire set up seems sturdy but didn't secure my tablet at all times. I had mine fall multiple times onto the ground. Thankfully it didn't break. I wouldn't recommend this if you spend a ton of money on a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far. The quality is much better than I thought because of the price. I do not use it in the bathroom so the toliet paper holder will go unused. I use it so when I'm playing video games off my 50 in tv I can watch a streaming app off of my 10 in amazon fire tablet. I did have to take the tablet off the case because it made it too thick to stay on. If the case was not a flip case I'm sure it would have been fine. I would buy again. Would give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: This well made item does what it promises!
customer_reviews.text: I use my iPad and my Kindle for a good part of every day. The adjustability of this stand has proved to be exactly what I needed. It holds my Kindle or my iPad at a comfortable level for me to read or use my tablet. The clip holds devices securely and can be swiveled to a horizontal or a vertical position easily without removing them. It is perfectly weighted and balanced. An item which works so well at such a reasonable price is hard to find. Pleasantly surprised. I am a 77 year old female.
customer_reviews.author: Ck

customer_reviews.title: Very solid product that can use small improvements
customer_reviews.text: Such a great sturdy product! Super easy to rotate and use. The only cons are: 1. Like other users said, the extension is a bit too short. Not a problem for me but it is shorter than normal and can be a challenge for some. 2. The clamp that holds the phone or iPad is super tight. You may get your fingers caught in there if not careful. 3. If you put your phone there, there’s not audio or charging port which is not ideal really... I’m still very happy to have it given the weight and convenience but I think improvements can Certainly be made to make this better.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great to get it out of your hands
customer_reviews.text: What a treat. Holds iPad well and is quality made with heavy base. Great to get it out of your hands, or to use as part of many computers available to you where you sit.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Loose telescoping poles
customer_reviews.text: Great for two weeks. It was shaky, but the weighted base was great and all seemed well but soon the metal poles were loose when raising and lowering stand. Finally one pole came out and I could not telescope it back together because a metal end cap broke at the end of the top piece.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but broke after only a few months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use with my iPad when I teach online lessons. It was great, a bit shorter than I would have liked, but doable. I have not been rough or abused this stand at all yet the head of the stand detached from the top pole and does not go back together. I have contacted the company so hopefully they will respond soon.
customer_reviews.author: Eat to live

customer_reviews.title: Short necked goose
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet holder, if you can place it where you use it. A T.P. holder is included, but, usable? The goose neck could be a bit longer, so that the stand could be farther away from right next to where you’re going to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr quick fix.

customer_reviews.title: I have no complaint but I would like to be able to stand and use the stand
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first JETTech floor stand and when I came my wife took it. I had to order a second one. The stand is very well built and holds my iPad Pro leaving me hands free. I have no complaint but I would like to be able to stand and use the stand. Great product. I have two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar L. Havaich

customer_reviews.title: Poor build materials sabotage what would be a good product
customer_reviews.text: Wobbled from the start but was relatively stable. The instructions were unclear on the telescoping rod but easy to figure out. However, despite my tablet being well under the weight tolerance, the gooseneck snapped clean off. Pretty shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: E.Mac

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stand, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This stand is very good. It is stable and will hold your phone or tablet very securely. What held it back from 5 stars is that there was no opening for a power connector when holding a phone vertically. I had to drill a hold to all the cable to connect the phone.
customer_reviews.author: methos

customer_reviews.title: Tablet Stand..
customer_reviews.text: I would of liked it to be taller. All the way up is about 3 feet. I also had to modify the tablet holder as photos show for 8 inch tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Solidly Constructed Stand
customer_reviews.text: Easily assembled with clear instructions. The heavy base will keep your tablet secure with no danger of tipping. Adjusts up and down very easily. I bought this to relieve my Carpal Tunnel Syndrome as I hold my tablet too much.
customer_reviews.author: Sniklu

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up.
customer_reviews.text: I use this stand when I exercise to hold my iPad. It was really handy when I use my inversion table. I had to take my iPad out of it’s case to use it. My biggest problem is that the knob that you tighten to hold the tension has stripped. Stand is now useless. Only had it 6 months and I don’t use it every day. Very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Jon A Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! Not only use it in the bathroom but in kitchen and living room too!
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing all the time. I use it in the kitchen when cooking to look at recipe and not have my iPad taking up valuable counter space. I use it when doing the dishes. I use it when in the living room to watch our security cameras when we are expecting company or to watch the baby monitor. 4 star becasue it is easy to pull the top piece out of the stand and the metal pipes seem a little bit thinner than i would like. It also snaps back pretty quickly if you arent careful but holds the iPad pretty securely.
customer_reviews.author: J. Criss

customer_reviews.title: Useful Tool
customer_reviews.text: Love the stand. It secury holds my iPad. I use it not just to give me hands-free use but also leave it in the stand when not using it - now I never guess where I left my iPad! The con — gooseneck is way too short. It doesn’t stretch far enough. I would give it 5 stars if the neck was longer. My 26 year old and 18 year old kids thought it was cool.
customer_reviews.author: Lori R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I do FaceTime with my daughter a lot & carry this everywhere in my house & use it for recipes in kitchen away from mess on the counter. It has a very strong hold onto my iPad I don’t worry about it falling. Very happy with it 😃😀😀
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Great stand to use your ipad
customer_reviews.text: The stand is sturdy and securely holds your ipad. I use the toilet paper loop to hang my headphones for my computer, so it keeps the tech I need close by, but saves my table space for other items I need near me.
customer_reviews.author: Deb C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and practical to use. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a well made product. It holds my iPad securely. I am an artist and use it by my easel for painting photos from my iPad. Puzzled by the toilet paper holder? Wish it were slightly longer to hold paper towels. Also wish the extension were just slightly longer. Other than that is great
customer_reviews.author: Michael Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Strudy iPad holder
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, i opted without the TP holder. now i carry it around the house so i can FaceTime my family and not hold it or be at a stupid angle.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this device .i use it next to my sofa while view television. It’s so easy to put together.Grips an holds my 9.6 iPad. The arm Is a good place for cloth to clean display. No more straining my neck to look away or down at display
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Not just for t.p.
customer_reviews.text: Not just for t.p. Love this thing!!!!! Adjustable, turns 360* and heavy enough not to fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Imnotabug

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the bathroom! I use it when I lay in the tub for a bath. Watched several NFL and news feeds and it’s very easy yet well made and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect holder for my 10" tablet
customer_reviews.text: Although this is supposed to be used in the bathroom, I purchased it to use by the bedside to watch TV on my tablet. It's the perfect height and allows you to either lay on your back or side for optimal viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before you buy!
customer_reviews.text: Beware. The product is quite heavy. They make you pay for returning it if you don’t like the product for any reason. The box is so heavy that it costs me twice the money that I bought to ship it back. So I just forget it and lose my money right there for a useless product. How am I supposed to know if this product would or would not work for me without trying it? Very disappointed. They should have given you a warning, but they don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Product works as intended. I won't be using it in the bathroom but this is an inexpensive tablet stand I can use as a musician.
customer_reviews.author: Rezon3

customer_reviews.title: It is already broken after a light usage for couple of months. Don't waster your money.
customer_reviews.text: It was unstable at day one. But I really need a stand, so I decided to keep it. After couple of months light use, it is broken and I have to trash it. I just found out I am out of the return window. It is very disappointed. If possible, I would give a 0 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ipad stand ever. Very easy to put together and has become a total game changer for me. Its light weight and a tad taller than I thought it would be which is a plus. Love love love this ipad stand. Oh and it comes with a lifetime warranty!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlow Betty

customer_reviews.title: Good product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was a little confused at first because the gooseneck part didn't look like the drawing. The company assured me it was correct. When I tried a bit harder I got it and now am using the stand just fine. It is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelie Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Height Not Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Just received yesterday. Stand was fairly easy to assemble. I haven't been able to truly use the stand but know I am going to use it a lot. I thought the 1height was adjustable but it's not. I like that the top is flexible so you can adjust your device.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Chips

customer_reviews.title: A Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. No additional tools required to put together save the included Allen wrench for one screw that is needed to attach the stem to the base. The holder is a bit tight for my 9.7 inch 5th generation iPad with case but it is definitely secure once it is in. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for exercise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have a CycleOps stationary bicycle trainer. I use this with my iPad Air and it works great when I work out. I use the toilet paper bar as a towel rack. The toilet paper bar can be discarded altogether if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Norman

customer_reviews.title: Not just for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: You don't have to put toilet paper on it. You can just hang your headphones there. Really like the stand. Bought it for Netflix in the hot tub, but ended up using it in other areas of the house as well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Travis

customer_reviews.title: Tablet floats in the air.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Easy to put together. Great for kitchens, workshop areas and teaching.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: the stand is great i’m tall could be a little higher. or a longer adjustable neck but i would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: IDA GRAY

customer_reviews.title: Best invention ever
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much bought second one. It’s perfect if sitting in your comfy chair or couch.
customer_reviews.author: IloveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Game changer.
customer_reviews.text: iPad secures tight. Sturdy. Not really a goose neck because it needs to be heavy to secure the iPad so that it doesn’t flop. Base is heavy. It’s short perfect for bed or sitting in the bathroom (ergo toilet roll holder. I love this thing. It’s a gamechanger
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase if you are over 5 feet in height !
customer_reviews.text: This item does not have enough height ! Very disappointed with this it sits to low ! It would be great if I was 5 feet or under ! And iam not sure what the toilet paper holder is about !
customer_reviews.author: Frank Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & stable
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. I found it shorter than I liked but it well done and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Beargrassgulch

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone says- too hard to get ipad out and needs to be able to get at least two inches higher.
customer_reviews.author: bestbookeater

customer_reviews.title: JETech Floor Stand
customer_reviews.text: I really like this floor stand. It fits my Samsung Galaxy tablet perfectly. I finally can use my tablet without looking down and getting neck pain. It is sturdy and a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand
customer_reviews.text: Nice stand, I use it in bath room for reading tablet so I dont have to hold it
customer_reviews.author: Ken huang

customer_reviews.title: Durable, good fit and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with how good the fit and finish was, And how durable it appears. For roughly $20 this is fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Terry K. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: No parts were missing.
customer_reviews.text: Everything needed to assemble was in the box. Even the Allen wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Rangeman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t noticed it had a toilet paper roll hook jaja!!! But is perfect for towel. Using the stand for Ipad to train indoor cycling!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liliana M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet stand
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and sleek. Using for a mixed media exhibit in museum display and as another reviewer shared, the tp holder makes an excellent place to hang a headset.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Accurate description of functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my purposes. Instead of toilet paper, I hang my headphones from the holder. (No, I’m not using the stand in the bathroom!) Although I’m sure it would work very well there too.
customer_reviews.author: Joann J.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mom's ipad, as she needs something with positioning flexibility but sturdiness with her disability. Seems to work great!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Martinka

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Wish i had bought this one first
customer_reviews.text: Stable, heavy, and easily adjustable. I hang my bluetooth headphones off the toilet paper holder. I also put my old Swirlygig on it so i have a drink holder now too. Great buy, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Buttafuoco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This stand works perfectly for my tablet, I have it right next to my chair and it is at the perfect height and is very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: bought this for when traveling to watch things on my tablet ,left off the paper roller lol and it is great sturdy base and great addition to our camper
customer_reviews.author: Dana L O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, bad customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The top sheared off. Bad quality, and really bad customer service for an item that had a lifetime warranty. No service. It’s also very short. The photos are misleading. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stable
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy stand. I use it as a bedside stand. The gooseneck could be a little longer, but it is satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Sphinx99

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for areas that don’t have good access to install ...
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. Exactly as described and works really well. Highly recommend for areas that don’t have good access to install a paper holder.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Glover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, excellent price, use in any room !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price, very sturdy. You do not have to put on “paper holder” therefore you can use in any room you choose.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but not as flexible as expected
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy & durable. I would like a more flexible head & the ability to use different sized tablets & a small ledge to prop up a paper, etc if needed. I’ve used this stand to teach ESL... no need for the paper roll on the side
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Coleman

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: This stand broke within a month. Cannot support a 10" ipad
customer_reviews.author: Joodle

customer_reviews.title: Good for the man's bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I have been "assigned" the basement bathroom by my wife but I don't mind... it is a nice bathroom. With the addition of this device , I can talk my time and enjoy a great sit down
customer_reviews.author: David Koch

customer_reviews.title: I use mine at trade shows, out of reach of prying hands.
customer_reviews.text: Agreed an extra foot on the gooseneck would make it perfect. That’s the only reason I’m not ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Lebby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tablet stand for a reading/tv chair or sofa
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly suited for a tablet stand next to a reading/tv chair or sofa. It has a very small profile. I use the tp holder to hang my Bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Sciprof

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Came missing one of the center poles. Impossible to assemble, so did not test the other functions.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is just as I expected. It seems to hold my iPad nice and secure. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I’ll be more happy if that adjustable telescoping pole was one more feet ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s not high enough for the treadmill. I have to put it on top of the chair to watch the program when I use the treadmill. I’ll be more happy if that adjustable telescoping pole was one more feet longer.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Z Mao

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Don't use it in bathroom, but sits by my favorite chair. I have issues with my hands that cause pain and cramping when I hold Kindle or phone. I can put either in this holder and enjoy! Well built and stable.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Too shaky
customer_reviews.text: Way too shaky. I play games on my iPad and this stand shakes each time you touch it. If you just want to read a book or watch a video it’s fine but if you want to touch it, pick a different stand.
customer_reviews.author: SullyJ

customer_reviews.title: Wow...Value
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly sturdy, love it, no problems, balance is perfect, base slides under sofa. Really pleased with this purchase, great for bedside reading. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This stand is short. I expected more height but it’s really short. I’m disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Key

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my dad. He loves it! We’re considering purchasing one for my elderly grandfather who enjoys reading on his iPad. This would be helpful for him as he has a hard time holding his iPad for long enough periods to enjoy reading.
customer_reviews.author: W. Nick Brown

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty base small device holder
customer_reviews.text: Was sent a defective stand. Unuseable. Returned it. Base is super heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Karamella

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad to receive it
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to receive it. I don’t have to hold my iPad in front of my son while he is having haircut with grandma. Also I feel more relax to lay down on my bed and watch my favorite episodes. The base is much heavier than I expected. I feel safer to grab my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT AND OUTSTANDING QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I use it to read while on the stationary bike. I can use it anywhere. The holder for the ipad is so secure. Everyone needs this!
customer_reviews.author: JoY

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is very sturdy and well made! I use it for a weekly video call that I have and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: YahAbba

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold my navigation unit in my RV
customer_reviews.author: J.R. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not tall—Spring mechanism could be dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: This is not very tall. Usable only if you are sitting. Also, the mechanism to secure iPad is so tight it’s extremely difficult to open out to slide the iPad in. If it snaps back on your finger you could be seriously injured.
customer_reviews.author: Kpoo1g

customer_reviews.title: Fits tightly!
customer_reviews.text: I can put this next to my recliner and it is like having a big screen TV. Solid build. Fits tightly!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for Ipad 7
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely difficult to fix the ipad 7 in it. Although it is claimed that ipad 7 will fit in it but to do it requires a combined effort of 2 persons....one to pull the holder and the other to somehow squeeze the ipad in it. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Atif D.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy; holds my iPad securely and can be maneuvered in any direction/position. Price is another bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: Mithridate

customer_reviews.title: Strong,flexible and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to read and watch video Nicely designed and good base support great stable yo can manually move for best position the price is not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: no more holding my tablet.
customer_reviews.text: use this for my tablet at my bedside. works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect stand for iPad... sturdy and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

product_meta.title: JETech Floor Stand Height-Adjustable Gooseneck with Toilet Paper Roll Holder for 7-11.8 Inch Tablets iPad Galaxy Tab
feature_bullets: Widely compatibility: the 360° rotatable tablet holder fits devices from 7 to 10.8 inches, including iPad 2/3/4, iPad 2017, iPad Air, iPad mini, iPad Pro (9.7-Inch and 10.5-Inch), Samsung Galaxy Tab and other tablets
Adjustable length: the length of the telescoping pole can be adjusted by pressing the clip on the middle of the pole
Flexible gooseneck: the gooseneck can be swiveled and bent in full rotation in any desired direction or position, no matter you are standing, sitting or lying
Roller holder design: the roller holder hangs toilet paper rolls, bags or other objects
Safety assurance: the two clamps in the holder have soft EVA pads to prevent scratches on your devices. Steel body and the heavy base supports the tablet stand steadily from falling down

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars290 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
